metadata.titleEn: Gridded pollen-based Holocene regional plant cover in temperate and northern subtropical China
metadata.titleCn: 基于孢粉的中国温带和北亚热带全新世以来1˚x1˚植被盖度定量重建
metadata.description:
The Regional Estimates of Vegetation Abundance from Large Sites (REVEALS) model was developed by Sugita (2007) to correct for bias due to inter-taxonomic differences in pollen productivity and dispersion and estimate plant cover at a regional spatial scale based on pollen records. We provide the dataset of pollen-based REVEALS reconstruction for temperate and northern sub-tropical China over the Holocene. The REVEALS reconstruction was achieved using 94 selected pollen records from lakes and bogs at a 1˚x1˚ spatial scale and a temporal resolution of 500 years between 11.7 and 0.7 ka BP, and three recent time windows (0.7˗0.35 ka BP, 0.35˗0.1 ka BP, and 0.1 ka BP˗present). 
The dataset of pollen-based REVEALS reconstruction of Holocene plant cover for the study region includes the REVEALS proportions of plant cover (and related SEs) for 75 1˚x 1˚grid cells and 25 time windows for each grid cell for 27 taxa, two alternatives of aggregation of plant taxa to PFTs: ten PFTs and six PFTs, and three land-cover types. The metadata files providing details on the sites used in the REVEALS reconstruction for each grid cell and each time window. For instance, the original site names, modern vegetation zones, geographical coordinates (latitude and longitude in decimal degrees), elevation in meters above sea level, site types (bog or lake), basin sizes (radius and area), number of 14C radiocarbon dates or other types of dates, approximate temporal extent of the site. The dataset is suitable for palaeoclimate modeling, can be applied also in evaluating simulations of past vegetation from dynamic vegetation models and anthropogenic land cover change (ALCC) scenarios.
metadata.descriptionCn:
Sugita （2007）提出的 REVEALS 模型，通过引入不同种属花粉产量，考量不同花粉类型的传播能力，以及不同沉积类型和沉积盆地大小对花粉源区的影响，将花粉组合定量转化为植被盖度，使得基于花粉的REVEALS植被重建结果更加接近真实的植被盖度。本文利用REVEALS 模型，基于94个高质量的湖泊/泥炭化石花粉数据，定量重建了我国温带和北亚热带区域的1˚x1˚空间分辨率的全新世植被覆盖变化。11.7 - 0.7 ka 时段，重建结果的分辨率为500年；0.7 ka至今，重建结果分辨率依次提高为350年（0.7˗0.35 ka），250年（0.35˗0.1 ka）和100年（0.1 ka 至今）。
研究区涵盖了75个1˚x1˚栅格范围，基于REVEALS的植被重建数据包含25个时间窗口内27个种属，两种植被功能型合并方式：6个植被功能型和10个植被功能型，以及3种土地覆盖类型的植被盖度数据及误差。元数据文件包含了重建样点名称、现代植被类型、年代个数、经纬度及海拔、沉积盆地的大小和类型等信息。本数据可被耦合到古气候模拟的模型中，也可用于评价和校正古植被模拟及土地利用模型。
metadata.instructions:
The dataset of pollen-based REVEALS estimates of Holocene plant cover for temperate and northern sub-tropical China comprises four csv files with the REVEALS proportions of plant cover (and related SEs) for 75 1˚x 1˚grid cells and 25 time windows for each grid cell for 27 taxa (Data1.plants.csv), 2) six PFTs (Data2.6PFTs.csv), 3) three land-cover types (Data3.LCTs.csv) and 4）ten PFTs (Data4.10PFTs.csv). The grid_cell column in the data table is represented as coordinates of left bottom corner, time_window column shows the interval between the starting and end time of the data compiled for reconstruction, e.g. 100-350 represent 350-100 BP (before present). Four additional files are complementing various information for the REVEALS dataset. Such as the metadata (Table S1, pollen data for details), the details on the sites used in the REVEALS reconstruction for each grid cell and each time window (Table S2), three Land-cover types (LCTs) and six plant functional types (PFTs) and their corresponding pollen morphological types (Table S3), and finally ten plant functional types (PFTs) and their corresponding pollen morphological types Table S4.
Scientific paper of the 10 PFTs has been published in Li et al. (2020). Paper for the rest of the data will soon be published.
Please cite the references below for the usage of the dataset.
Li, F. et al., Towards quantification of Holocene anthropogenic land-cover change in temperate China: A review in the light of pollen-based REVEALS reconstructions of regional plant cover, Earth-Science Reviews, 103119, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.earscirev.2020.103119, 2020.
Li, F. et al., Gridded pollen-based Holocene regional plant cover in temperate and northern subtropical China suitable for climate modeling and evaluation of dynamic vegetation models and ALCC scenarios. (Under review) Li, F. et al., Gridded pollen-based Holocene regional plant cover in temperate and northern subtropical China suitable for climate modeling and evaluation of dynamic vegetation models and ALCC scenarios. (Under review)

background: Vegetation has undergone changes all over the globe throughout the Holocene as a result of climate change from the early Holocene on and disturbance from anthropogenic activities from the mid-Holocene on. Pollen data mapping can provide insights into temporal and spatial vegetation changes at broad continental scales. However, the quantification of past vegetation changes based on fossil pollen data is necessary to answer specific research questions on the relationship between plant cover and e.g. climate or biodiversity. Techniques such as biomization and the modern analogue technique (MAT) have been widely applied to reconstruct past continental-scale changes in vegetation cover. These techniques have the disadvantage that they cannot quantify the cover of individual plant taxa. The possible effects of anthropogenic land-cover (LC) transformation due to past land-use (LU) changes (LULC changes) on the Holocene climate is still an issue of debate. Current earth system models (ESMs) take care of the climate–land vegetation interactions by coupling a dynamic vegetation model (DVM) with the climate model. DVMs simulate climate-induced (natural) vegetation. Therefore, past LULC changes have to be estimated to study their effect on past climate. The anthropogenic land-cover change (ALCC) scenarios most commonly used by palaeoclimate modellers are those from the HYDE database and the KK10 dataset of past deforestation. These scenarios are based on a number of assumptions for population growth, per-capita land use, and other parameters that influenced land use over time in the past. Therefore, a current priority is to produce datasets of pollen- and archaeology-based data of past LU and LC that can be used in palaeoclimate modelling or the evaluation of DVMs and ALCCs. Several reconstructions of the biomes and vegetation cover of China during the Holocene are available. However, these reconstructions do not provide quantitative information on the spatial extent of deforested land within woodland biomes or of vegetation types including both trees and herbs.
research objective: The objective is to provide a dataset of pollen-based land cover for the last ca. 12 millennia that is suitable for palaeoclimate modelling and for the evaluation of simulated past vegetation cover from dynamic vegetation models and anthropogenic land-cover change (ALCC) scenarios. In this paper, we present the first pollen-based quantitative reconstruction of Holocene plant-cover changes in temperate and northern subtropical China using the Regional Estimates of VEgetation Abundance from Large Sites (REVEALS) model.
challenges: The quality of the REVEALS reconstructions is mainly reliant on the input data (pollen count quality and size), reliability of the chronologies of pollen records and the relative pollen productivities used, type and size of the pollen sites (lakes or bogs), number of pollen records used for reconstruction in each grid cell, and variation between pollen counts within a grid cell. REVEALS was intended for pollen records from large lakes. Pollen records from bogs violate the model’s assumption that no plants are growing on the surface of the deposition basin. The uncertainty in the RPP estimates used is another factor influencing the reliability of the REVEALS reconstructions. The number of values available in the calculation of the mean RPP estimates and the locations of the RPP studies in terms of vegetation zones are provided in Table 1. The REVEALS model estimates the proportion of each plant taxon in relation to the total cover of all taxa with the RPP estimates available (in this case, 27 taxa) rather than its actual cover if all existing taxa could be considered.
methods: The REVEALS reconstruction was achieved using 94 selected pollen records from lakes and bogs at a 1°×1° spatial scale and a temporal resolution of 500 years between 11.7 and 0.7 ka and in three recent time windows (0.7–0.35 ka, 0.35–0.1 ka, and 0.1 ka to present). The dataset includes REVEALS estimates of cover and their standard errors (SEs) for 27 plant taxa in 75 1°×1° grid cells distributed within the study region. The 27 plant taxa were also grouped into 6 plant functional types and 3 land-cover types (coniferous trees CT, broadleaved trees BT, and C3 herbs/open land (C3H/OL)), and their REVEALS estimates of cover and related SEs were calculated.
dataset: The dataset includes REVEALS estimates of cover and their standard errors (SEs) for 27 plant taxa in 75 1°×1° grid cells distributed within the study region. The dataset of gridded pollen-based REVEALS estimates of plant cover for temperate and northern subtropical China presented in this paper is based on the REVEALS estimates published in Li et al. (2020). It includes, for 25 consecutive time windows of the Holocene, cover estimates for 27 plant taxa that are further grouped into estimates of cover for 6 plant functional types (PFTs) and 3 land-cover types (LCTs), i.e. coniferous trees (CT), broadleaved trees (BT), and C3 herbs/open land (C3H/OL).
findings: The REVEALS reconstructions suggest that the cover of Poaceae, Cyperaceae, and Rosaceae during the Holocene is often equal to or larger than the cover of all remaining 11 herbs together, although the cover provided by Artemisia and Amaranthaceae/Chenopodiaceae can also be relatively large. There is a consistent increase in CT cover in most grid cells over northern China during the first half of the Holocene, with maximum values occurring sometime between 8 and 5 ka (the timing depends on the region), before a steady decline in the values of CT cover. The changes in cover of BT during the Holocene show similar trends to those for CT: a steady increase during the first half of the Holocene, with the highest values found in the time windows from 8.2–7.7 to 5.2–4.7 ka (depending on the region), followed by a steady decrease through the late Holocene.
backgroundCn: 植被在整个全新世期间经历了全球范围的变化，这些变化是由于早期全新世的气候变化以及中期全新世以来人类活动的干扰所导致的。花粉数据映射可以提供关于广泛大陆尺度上植被变化的时间和空间洞察。然而，基于化石花粉数据对过去植被变化的量化是必要的，以回答关于植物覆盖与气候或生物多样性等特定研究问题。生物化技术和现代类比技术（MAT）已被广泛应用于重建过去大陆尺度的植被覆盖变化。这些技术的缺点在于无法量化单个植物分类群的覆盖情况。由于过去土地利用（LU）变化（LULC变化）对全新世气候的影响仍然存在争议，目前的地球系统模型（ESMs）通过将动态植被模型（DVM）与气候模型耦合来处理气候与土地植被的相互作用。DVM模拟气候引起的（自然）植被。因此，必须估计过去的LULC变化，以研究其对过去气候的影响。古气候模型者最常使用的人为土地覆盖变化（ALCC）情景是HYDE数据库和KK10过去森林砍伐的数据集。这些情景基于一系列关于人口增长、人均土地使用和其他影响过去土地使用的参数的假设。因此，目前的优先事项是生成基于花粉和考古数据的过去土地利用和土地覆盖的数据集，这些数据集可以用于古气候建模或动态植被模型和ALCC的评估。关于全新世期间中国生物群落和植被覆盖的几种重建已经可用。然而，这些重建并未提供关于森林生物群落中被砍伐土地的空间范围或包括树木和草本植物的植被类型的定量信息。
research objectiveCn: 我们的目标是提供一个基于花粉的土地覆盖数据集，涵盖大约过去12000年的时间，适用于古气候建模以及评估动态植被模型模拟的过去植被覆盖和人类活动引起的土地覆盖变化（ALCC）情景。在本文中，我们展示了使用大规模区域植被丰度估计模型（REVEALS）对温带和北亚热带中国的全新世植物覆盖变化进行的首次基于花粉的定量重建。
challengesCn: REVEALS重建的质量主要依赖于输入数据（花粉计数的质量和数量）、花粉记录的年代学可靠性、使用的相对花粉生产力、花粉采样地点的类型和大小（湖泊或泥炭地）、每个网格单元用于重建的花粉记录数量以及网格单元内花粉计数的变异性。REVEALS模型是为大型湖泊的花粉记录而设计的。来自泥炭地的花粉记录违反了模型的假设，即沉积盆地表面没有植物生长。用于RPP估计的不确定性是影响REVEALS重建可靠性的另一个因素。表1提供了用于计算平均RPP估计的可用值数量以及RPP研究在植被带中的位置。REVEALS模型估计每种植物分类群相对于所有分类群总覆盖的比例，基于可用的RPP估计（在这种情况下为27个分类群），而不是如果所有现存分类群都能被考虑时的实际覆盖。
methodsCn: REVEALS重建是通过使用来自湖泊和泥炭地的94个选定花粉记录，在1°×1°的空间尺度和500年的时间分辨率下实现的，时间范围为11.7至0.7千年前，以及三个最近的时间窗口（0.7–0.35千年前、0.35–0.1千年前和0.1千年前至今）。该数据集包括27种植物分类群在75个1°×1°网格单元中的REVEALS覆盖估计及其标准误差（SE）。这27种植物分类群还被分为6种植物功能类型和3种土地覆盖类型（针叶树CT、阔叶树BT和C3草本/开放土地（C3H/OL）），并计算了它们的REVEALS覆盖估计及相关的SE。
datasetCn: 该数据集包括在研究区域内分布的75个1°×1°网格单元中27种植物分类群的REVEALS覆盖估计及其标准误差（SE）。本文中基于花粉的REVEALS植物覆盖估计的数据集，涵盖了温带和北亚热带中国，基于Li等人（2020）发布的REVEALS估计。该数据集包括在全新世的25个连续时间窗口中，27种植物分类群的覆盖估计，这些分类群进一步分组为6种植物功能类型（PFTs）和3种土地覆盖类型（LCTs），即针叶树（CT）、阔叶树（BT）和C3草本/开阔地（C3H/OL）。
findingsCn: REVEALS重建结果表明，在全新世期间，禾本科（Poaceae）、莎草科（Cyperaceae）和蔷薇科（Rosaceae）的覆盖率通常等于或大于其余11种草本植物的总覆盖率，尽管蒿属（Artemisia）和藜科（Amaranthaceae/Chenopodiaceae）提供的覆盖率也可能相对较大。在中国北方的大多数网格单元中，CT覆盖率在全新世的前半段呈现出持续增加的趋势，最大值出现在8千年至5千年之间（具体时间因地区而异），随后CT覆盖率稳步下降。全新世期间BT的覆盖变化趋势与CT相似：在全新世的前半段稳步增加，最高值出现在8.2–7.7千年至5.2–4.7千年之间（具体时间因地区而异），随后在晚全新世期间稳步下降。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the REVEALS model primarily intended for use with pollen records from large lakes?
Verification.QuestionCn: REVEALS模型主要用于大型湖泊的花粉记录吗？

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the REVEALS dataset include cover estimates for both plant functional types and land-cover types?
Verification.QuestionCn: REVEALS 数据集是否包括植物功能类型和土地覆盖类型的覆盖估计？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the key challenges in data collection for quantitative reconstruction of Holocene plant-cover changes using the REVEALS model?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 使用REVEALS模型进行全新世植物覆盖变化的定量重建时，数据收集面临的主要挑战是什么？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: quality of pollen count data, reliability of pollen record chronologies, relative pollen productivities, type and size of pollen sites, variation between pollen counts within a grid cell
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 花粉计数数据的质量、花粉记录年表的可靠性、相对花粉生产力、花粉采样点的类型和大小、网格单元内花粉计数的变化。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the pollen records collected from for the REVEALS reconstructions in temperate and northern subtropical China?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: REVEALS重建中，温带和北亚热带中国的花粉记录是从哪里收集的？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that quantifies past vegetation changes using pollen data?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个使用花粉数据量化过去植被变化的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: The REVEALS model is an example of a data collection method that quantifies past vegetation changes by transforming pollen assemblages into estimates of vegetation cover. It considers pollen productivity of different species, pollen dispersal, and the influence of sediment basin size and type on pollen source areas.
Example.AnswerCn: REVEALS模型是一种数据收集方法，通过将花粉组合转化为植被覆盖估计来量化过去的植被变化。它考虑了不同物种的花粉生产力、花粉传播以及沉积盆地的大小和类型对花粉来源区域的影响。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when using pollen records from bogs in vegetation reconstruction?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用泥炭沼泽中的花粉记录进行植被重建时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: One challenge faced when using pollen records from bogs is that they can violate the assumptions of models like REVEALS, which assume no plants are growing on the surface of the deposition basin. This can affect the reliability of the vegetation reconstructions.
Example.AnswerCn: 使用泥炭沼泽的花粉记录时面临的一个挑战是，这些记录可能违反像REVEALS这样的模型的假设，这些模型假设沉积盆地的表面没有植物生长。这可能影响植被重建的可靠性。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you illustrate a type of dataset that includes estimates of plant cover and their standard errors for specific taxa in a defined region?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否举例说明一种数据集，其中包括特定区域内特定分类群的植物覆盖估计值及其标准误差？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset of gridded pollen-based REVEALS estimates includes cover and standard errors for 27 plant taxa in a specified region, grouped into different plant functional types and land-cover types, distributed across 1°×1° grid cells. This dataset is used to reconstruct Holocene plant-cover changes in temperate and northern subtropical China.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个基于花粉的REVEALS估计的网格数据集包括27种植物分类群在特定区域的覆盖率和标准误差，这些分类群按不同的植物功能类型和土地覆盖类型分组，分布在1°×1°的网格单元中。该数据集用于重建温带和北亚热带中国的全新世植物覆盖变化。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the main factors influencing the quality and reliability of pollen-based vegetation reconstruction datasets?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 影响基于花粉的植被重建数据集质量和可靠性的主要因素有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: input data quality, reliability of chronologies of pollen records, relative pollen productivities used, type and size of pollen sites, number of pollen records used for reconstruction in each grid cell, variation between pollen counts within a grid cell, uncertainty in the relative pollen productivity estimates
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 输入数据质量、花粉记录年代学的可靠性、使用的相对花粉生产力、花粉采样点的类型和大小、每个网格单元用于重建的花粉记录数量、网格单元内花粉计数的变化、相对花粉生产力估计的不确定性。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What characteristics define the resolution and temporal scope of pollen-based datasets for Holocene vegetation cover changes?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 什么特征定义了基于花粉的数据集在全新世植被覆盖变化中的分辨率和时间范围？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 1°×1° spatial resolution, 500-year temporal resolution between 11.7 and 0.7 ka, 350-year resolution from 0.7–0.35 ka, 250-year resolution from 0.35–0.1 ka, 100-year resolution from 0.1 ka to present
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 1°×1°空间分辨率，11.7至0.7千年期间为500年时间分辨率，0.7至0.35千年期间为350年分辨率，0.35至0.1千年期间为250年分辨率，0.1千年至今为100年分辨率。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific features are included in the metadata of pollen-based vegetation reconstruction datasets?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 花粉基础植被重建数据集的元数据中包含哪些具体特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: names of reconstruction sites, modern vegetation types, number of chronological records, latitude, longitude, elevation, size and type of sedimentary basins
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 重建地点名称、现代植被类型、年代记录数量、纬度、经度、海拔、高度和沉积盆地类型。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many grid cells are included in the pollen-based REVEALS dataset for temperate and northern subtropical China?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 温带和北亚热带中国的基于花粉的REVEALS数据集包含多少个网格单元？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the temporal resolution for the REVEALS reconstruction dataset during the period of 11.7 to 0.7 ka?
Quantification.QuestionCn: REVEALS重建数据集在11.7到0.7千年前的时间分辨率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the REVEALS model in the context of quantitative vegetation reconstruction?
Definition.QuestionCn: REVEALS模型是在定量植被重建的背景下使用的一种模型。
Definition.AnswerEn: The REVEALS model refers to a method for quantitative vegetation reconstruction based on pollen data. It involves converting pollen assemblages into estimates of vegetation cover by accounting for factors such as differential pollen productivity of plant taxa, pollen dispersal abilities, and the impact of sediment type and basin size on the pollen source area. This approach aims to produce more accurate reconstructions of past vegetation cover.
Definition.AnswerCn: REVEALS模型是基于花粉数据进行定量植被重建的一种方法。它通过考虑植物分类群的不同花粉生产力、花粉传播能力以及沉积物类型和盆地大小对花粉来源区的影响，将花粉组合转换为植被覆盖估计。该方法旨在产生更准确的过去植被覆盖重建。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with using pollen data for reconstructing past vegetation cover?
Definition.QuestionCn: 使用花粉数据重建过去植被覆盖时面临哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Challenges in using pollen data for reconstructing past vegetation cover include reliance on the quality of input data such as pollen count and size, accuracy of pollen record chronologies, and the relative pollen productivities used. Additional challenges involve the type and size of pollen sites, the number of pollen records per grid cell, variation between pollen counts, and the assumption that no plants grow on the surface of deposition basins in the case of bogs.
Definition.AnswerCn: 使用花粉数据重建过去植被覆盖的挑战包括对输入数据质量的依赖，例如花粉计数和大小、花粉记录年代学的准确性以及相对花粉生产力的使用。其他挑战还包括花粉采样点的类型和大小、每个网格单元的花粉记录数量、花粉计数之间的变异，以及在沼泽的沉积盆地表面没有植物生长的假设。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do data collection methods in the REVEALS model compare with those used in the biomization and modern analogue technique (MAT) for reconstructing past vegetation cover in terms of spatial and temporal resolution?
Comparison.QuestionCn: REVEALS模型中的数据收集方法与生物化和现代类比技术（MAT）在重建过去植被覆盖方面的空间和时间分辨率有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The REVEALS model uses high-quality pollen records from lakes and bogs at a 1°x1° spatial scale with a temporal resolution of 500 years for most of the Holocene and increased resolution in recent times. In contrast, biomization and MAT often do not provide quantitative cover information for individual plant taxa and may have limitations in spatial and temporal resolution.
Comparison.AnswerCn: REVEALS模型使用来自湖泊和泥炭沼泽的高质量花粉记录，空间尺度为1°x1°，在全新世的大部分时间内具有500年的时间分辨率，而在最近的时间内分辨率有所提高。相比之下，生物化和现代气候相似性（MAT）通常无法提供单个植物分类群的定量覆盖信息，并且在空间和时间分辨率上可能存在局限性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences in challenges faced by the REVEALS model and dynamic vegetation models (DVMs) when used for simulating past vegetation cover changes?
Comparison.QuestionCn: REVEALS模型和动态植被模型（DVMs）在模拟过去植被覆盖变化时面临的挑战有哪些相似之处和不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both the REVEALS model and DVMs face challenges related to the accuracy of input data and assumptions. The REVEALS model's challenges include reliance on pollen count quality, chronology reliability, and assumptions about pollen productivity and deposition sites. DVMs simulate natural vegetation and must estimate past land-use changes for accurate climate interactions, facing challenges in representing anthropogenic influences accurately.
Comparison.AnswerCn: REVEALS模型和DVMs都面临与输入数据和假设相关的准确性挑战。REVEALS模型的挑战包括对花粉计数质量的依赖、年代学的可靠性以及对花粉生产力和沉积地点的假设。DVMs模拟自然植被，必须估计过去的土地利用变化以准确反映气候相互作用，面临准确表示人类影响的挑战。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do datasets of pollen-based land cover using the REVEALS model differ from those based on the HYDE database and KK10 dataset in terms of assumptions and data sources?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用REVEALS模型的基于花粉的土地覆盖数据集与基于HYDE数据库和KK10数据集的数据集在假设和数据来源方面有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Datasets using the REVEALS model are based on pollen data and aim to provide quantitative reconstructions of past vegetation cover, considering different taxa and their relative productivities. In contrast, the HYDE database and KK10 dataset rely on assumptions about population growth and land use over time, often lacking specific pollen-based data inputs and focusing on broader land-cover change scenarios.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用REVEALS模型的数据集基于花粉数据，旨在提供过去植被覆盖的定量重建，考虑不同分类群及其相对生产力。相比之下，HYDE数据库和KK10数据集依赖于对人口增长和土地利用随时间变化的假设，通常缺乏具体的基于花粉的数据输入，侧重于更广泛的土地覆盖变化情景。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do the challenges in data collection, such as the reliability of chronologies and the size/type of pollen sites, impact the interpretation of reconstructed vegetation cover?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 数据收集中的挑战，例如年表的可靠性和花粉采样点的大小/类型，如何影响对重建植被覆盖的解读？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in data collection, including the reliability of chronologies and the type and size of pollen sites, significantly impact the interpretation of reconstructed vegetation cover. These factors affect the quality of the REVEALS reconstructions, as inaccuracies in pollen counts or inappropriate site characteristics, like using bogs where the assumption of no plant growth on the deposition surface is violated, can lead to unreliable vegetation cover estimates. Thus, careful consideration of these variables is crucial for accurate interpretations.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据收集中的挑战，包括年代学的可靠性和花粉采样点的类型与大小，显著影响了重建植被覆盖的解释。这些因素影响了REVEALS重建的质量，因为花粉计数的不准确或不适当的采样点特征（例如，在假设沉积表面没有植物生长的沼泽中进行采样）可能导致植被覆盖估计的不可靠。因此，仔细考虑这些变量对于准确的解释至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors influence the reliability of REVEALS reconstructions in estimating vegetation cover?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响REVEALS重建在估计植被覆盖方面可靠性的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The reliability of REVEALS reconstructions is influenced by factors such as the quality and size of pollen counts, the reliability of the chronologies of pollen records, the accuracy of relative pollen productivity estimates, the number of pollen records used per grid cell, and the type and size of pollen deposition sites. Additionally, variations in pollen counts within a grid cell and the assumption violations in pollen records from bogs also affect reliability.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: REVEALS重建的可靠性受到多个因素的影响，例如花粉计数的质量和数量、花粉记录的年代学可靠性、相对花粉生产力估计的准确性、每个网格单元使用的花粉记录数量以及花粉沉积地点的类型和大小。此外，网格单元内花粉计数的变化以及来自沼泽的花粉记录中的假设违反也会影响可靠性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using pollen records from bogs instead of large lakes on the quality of vegetation cover reconstructions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用沼泽中的花粉记录而不是大湖中的花粉记录对植被覆盖重建的质量可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using pollen records from bogs could violate the REVEALS model's assumption that no plants are growing on the surface of the deposition basin, potentially affecting the reliability of vegetation cover reconstructions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用泥炭沼泽的花粉记录可能会违反REVEALS模型的假设，即沉积盆地表面没有植物生长，这可能会影响植被覆盖重建的可靠性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the uncertainty in relative pollen productivity (RPP) estimates impact the results of pollen-based land cover reconstructions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 相对花粉生产力（RPP）估计的不确定性可能会如何影响基于花粉的土地覆盖重建结果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Uncertainty in RPP estimates can influence the reliability of the REVEALS reconstructions as they affect the estimated proportion of each plant taxon in relation to the total cover of all taxa.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: RPP估计的不确定性会影响REVEALS重建的可靠性，因为它们会影响各植物分类群相对于所有分类群总覆盖的估计比例。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: If fossil pollen data from multiple sites are used for reconstruction in each grid cell, what could be the impact on the variability of pollen counts within those grid cells?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 如果在每个网格单元中使用来自多个地点的化石花粉数据进行重建，这可能会对这些网格单元内的花粉计数变异性产生什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using fossil pollen data from multiple sites may result in variation between pollen counts within a grid cell, which could affect the consistency and accuracy of the reconstructed vegetation cover.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用来自多个地点的化石花粉数据可能导致网格单元内的花粉计数存在差异，这可能影响重建植被覆盖的一致性和准确性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to create a dataset of pollen-based land cover for the last 12 millennia in temperate and northern subtropical China?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么有必要创建一个关于过去12000年温带和北亚热带中国的基于花粉的土地覆盖数据集？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to provide a dataset of pollen-based land cover for the last ca. 12 millennia that is suitable for palaeoclimate modelling and for the evaluation of simulated past vegetation cover from dynamic vegetation models and anthropogenic land-cover change (ALCC) scenarios.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是提供一个基于花粉的土地覆盖数据集，涵盖大约过去12000年的时间，适用于古气候建模以及评估动态植被模型模拟的过去植被覆盖和人类活动土地覆盖变化（ALCC）情景。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to address input data quality and uncertainties in the REVEALS reconstructions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在REVEALS重建中，解决输入数据质量和不确定性的问题非常重要。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The quality of the REVEALS reconstructions is mainly reliant on the input data quality, including pollen count quality and size, reliability of the chronologies, and the accuracy of relative pollen productivities. Addressing these factors is crucial to ensure the reliability of REVEALS reconstructions, as uncertainties in these estimates can influence the outcomes of the reconstructions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: REVEALS重建的质量主要依赖于输入数据的质量，包括花粉计数的质量和大小、年表的可靠性以及相对花粉生产力的准确性。解决这些因素对于确保REVEALS重建的可靠性至关重要，因为这些估计中的不确定性可能会影响重建的结果。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the key steps involved in utilizing the REVEALS model for quantitative reconstruction of vegetation cover using fossil pollen data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 利用REVEALS模型通过化石花粉数据进行植被覆盖的定量重建的关键步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The REVEALS model requires the selection of high-quality pollen records from lakes and bogs, determination of the relative pollen productivity for different taxa, and estimation of plant cover using spatial grids. The model considers the type and size of pollen deposition sites and uses temporal windows for different periods to achieve a quantitative reconstruction of vegetation cover.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: REVEALS模型需要从湖泊和泥炭沼泽中选择高质量的花粉记录，确定不同分类群的相对花粉生产力，并使用空间网格估算植物覆盖率。该模型考虑了花粉沉积地点的类型和大小，并使用不同时间段的时间窗口，以实现对植被覆盖的定量重建。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can researchers address the challenges of uncertainty in relative pollen productivity estimates when using the REVEALS model for vegetation reconstruction?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 研究人员如何在使用REVEALS模型进行植被重建时应对相对花粉生产力估计的不确定性挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Researchers can address these challenges by ensuring a large number of values in the calculation of mean relative pollen productivity estimates and carefully selecting the locations of studies within relevant vegetation zones. This helps improve the reliability of the reconstructions.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 研究人员可以通过确保在计算平均相对花粉生产力估计时使用大量值，以及仔细选择研究地点在相关植被带内，来应对这些挑战。这有助于提高重建的可靠性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps should be followed to compile a dataset of pollen-based land cover suitable for palaeoclimate modeling?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了编制适合古气候建模的基于花粉的土地覆盖数据集，应遵循以下程序步骤：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To compile such a dataset, researchers should collect and verify pollen data from reliable sources, apply the REVEALS model to estimate vegetation cover, and group the data into appropriate plant functional types and land-cover types. It is essential to maintain temporal consistency across the Holocene and ensure the inclusion of standard errors for each estimate to facilitate its use in palaeoclimate modeling.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了编制这样的数据集，研究人员应从可靠来源收集和验证花粉数据，应用REVEALS模型来估算植被覆盖，并将数据分组为适当的植物功能类型和土地覆盖类型。保持全新世时期的时间一致性至关重要，并确保每个估计值包含标准误差，以便于在古气候建模中的使用。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or features are necessary for reliable REVEALS model reconstructions of vegetation cover?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 可靠的REVEALS模型植被覆盖重建所需的条件或特征是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Reliable REVEALS model reconstructions require high-quality input data, accurate chronologies of pollen records, reliable relative pollen productivities, appropriate type and size of pollen sites, and sufficient pollen records within each grid cell.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 可靠的REVEALS模型重建需要高质量的输入数据、准确的花粉记录年代、可靠的相对花粉生产力、适当类型和大小的花粉采样点，以及每个网格单元内足够的花粉记录。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the use of pollen data mapping enable insights into temporal and spatial vegetation changes at broad continental scales?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 花粉数据映射的使用如何在广泛的大陆尺度上提供对时间和空间植被变化的洞察？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Pollen data mapping enables insights into temporal and spatial vegetation changes by providing quantitative reconstructions of plant-cover changes over millennia, which are suitable for palaeoclimate modeling and evaluation of dynamic vegetation models and anthropogenic land-cover change scenarios.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 花粉数据映射通过提供对植物覆盖变化的定量重建，使我们能够洞察时间和空间上的植被变化，这些重建适用于古气候模型、动态植被模型的评估以及人类活动引起的土地覆盖变化情景。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the REVEALS model produce unexpected results in estimating vegetation cover during certain periods of the Holocene?
Expectation.QuestionCn: REVEALS模型在估计全新世某些时期的植被覆盖时，可能会产生意想不到的结果，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The REVEALS model's results depend heavily on the input data quality, including pollen count quality, size, and the reliability of the chronologies of pollen records. Variations in these factors and the assumptions about pollen records from different types of sites can lead to unexpected results.
Expectation.AnswerCn: REVEALS模型的结果在很大程度上依赖于输入数据的质量，包括花粉计数的质量、大小以及花粉记录年代学的可靠性。这些因素的变化以及对不同类型地点的花粉记录的假设可能导致意想不到的结果。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why would the reconstruction of past vegetation cover using pollen data face challenges in accurately representing land-cover changes over time?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用花粉数据重建过去植被覆盖的过程面临着准确表示土地覆盖变化的挑战，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Reconstructing past vegetation cover using pollen data can be challenging due to the reliance on assumptions about pollen productivity and dispersal, the type and size of deposition sites, and the uncertainties in Relative Pollen Productivities (RPP) estimates that influence the reliability of the reconstructions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 利用花粉数据重建过去的植被覆盖情况可能面临挑战，因为这依赖于对花粉生产力和传播的假设、沉积地点的类型和大小，以及相对花粉生产力（RPP）估计的不确定性，这些因素影响重建的可靠性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it critical to improve datasets of past land use and land cover changes for palaeoclimate modeling?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 改善过去土地利用和土地覆盖变化的数据集对于古气候建模至关重要，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Improving datasets of past land use and cover changes is crucial because current earth system models depend on accurate data to simulate climate-induced vegetation changes and assess the impacts of anthropogenic land-cover transformation on past climate scenarios. Existing scenarios often rely on assumptions that may not fully capture the complexities of historical land use.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 改善过去土地利用和覆盖变化的数据集至关重要，因为当前的地球系统模型依赖于准确的数据来模拟气候引起的植被变化，并评估人类土地覆盖转变对过去气候情景的影响。现有的情景往往依赖于可能无法完全捕捉历史土地利用复杂性的假设。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you evaluate the effectiveness of using the REVEALS model for quantifying past vegetation cover changes in China during the Holocene?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您如何评估使用REVEALS模型量化中国全新世植被覆盖变化的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The effectiveness of using the REVEALS model for quantifying past vegetation cover changes in China during the Holocene is reliant on several factors, including the quality and size of pollen count data, the reliability of pollen record chronologies, the accuracy of relative pollen productivity estimates, and the type and size of pollen sites. Despite these challenges, the REVEALS method provides a quantitative reconstruction that is suitable for palaeoclimate modeling and evaluating dynamic vegetation models and anthropogenic land-cover change scenarios.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用REVEALS模型量化中国全新世植被覆盖变化的有效性依赖于几个因素，包括花粉计数数据的质量和数量、花粉记录年代的可靠性、相对花粉生产力估计的准确性以及花粉采样点的类型和规模。尽管面临这些挑战，REVEALS方法提供的定量重建适合用于古气候建模、评估动态植被模型和人类活动土地覆盖变化情景。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the primary challenges associated with collecting high-quality pollen data for use in vegetation cover reconstructions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 收集高质量花粉数据以用于植被覆盖重建的主要挑战是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Primary challenges include ensuring the quality of pollen counts, maintaining reliable chronologies of pollen records, obtaining accurate relative pollen productivity estimates, and selecting appropriate types and sizes of pollen sites. Additionally, the number of pollen records used for reconstruction in each grid cell and the variation between pollen counts within a grid cell also pose significant challenges.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 主要挑战包括确保花粉计数的质量、维护花粉记录的可靠年表、获得准确的相对花粉生产力估计，以及选择合适类型和大小的花粉采样点。此外，用于每个网格单元重建的花粉记录数量以及网格单元内花粉计数的变异性也构成了重大挑战。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how data from lakes and bogs can be equally used for vegetation cover reconstruction when they might have different deposition characteristics.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解湖泊和沼泽的数据如何可以同样用于植被覆盖重建，因为它们可能具有不同的沉积特征。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The REVEALS model was originally intended for pollen records from large lakes, as it assumes no plants are growing on the deposition basin's surface. Using pollen records from bogs can violate this assumption, potentially affecting the reconstruction's quality. The model's reliability depends on factors such as the type and size of the pollen sites and the variation in pollen counts within a grid cell.
Assertion.AnswerCn: REVEALS模型最初是为大型湖泊的花粉记录而设计的，因为它假设沉积盆地表面没有植物生长。使用沼泽的花粉记录可能会违反这一假设，从而影响重建的质量。该模型的可靠性取决于多个因素，例如花粉采样点的类型和大小，以及网格单元内花粉计数的变化。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline the challenges of utilizing pollen data for quantitative vegetation reconstruction and how they are addressed in data collection methods.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 概述利用花粉数据进行定量植被重建的挑战，以及在数据收集方法中如何解决这些挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges include the quality and size of pollen count data, reliability of pollen record chronologies, relative pollen productivities, type and size of pollen sites, and variations in pollen counts within grid cells. These are addressed by selecting high-quality pollen records from lakes and bogs and utilizing the REVEALS model to estimate vegetation cover while considering relative pollen productivities.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括花粉计数数据的质量和规模、花粉记录年表的可靠性、相对花粉生产力、花粉采样点的类型和规模，以及网格单元内花粉计数的变化。这些问题通过选择来自湖泊和泥炭沼泽的高质量花粉记录以及利用REVEALS模型来估计植被覆盖，同时考虑相对花粉生产力来解决。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the data collection methods used to achieve high temporal resolution in pollen-based vegetation cover datasets.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述用于实现高时间分辨率的基于花粉的植被覆盖数据集的数据收集方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection methods involve using 94 selected pollen records at a 1°x1° spatial scale, achieving temporal resolutions of 500 years between 11.7 and 0.7 ka, and then increasing the resolution to 350 years, 250 years, and 100 years for more recent time windows. This approach provides detailed insights into vegetation changes over time.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法涉及使用94个选定的花粉记录，空间尺度为1°x1°，在11.7千年前到0.7千年前之间实现500年的时间分辨率，然后在更近的时间窗口中将分辨率提高到350年、250年和100年。这种方法提供了对植被变化的详细洞察。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please suggest potential strategies for refining datasets of Holocene plant-cover changes using pollen data.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请建议潜在的策略，以利用花粉数据精炼全新世植物覆盖变化的数据集。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential strategies include increasing the number of pollen records used for reconstruction in each grid cell, improving the accuracy of relative pollen productivity estimates, and expanding the geographical coverage of pollen data collection sites to ensure diverse representation of different vegetation zones.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的策略包括增加每个网格单元中用于重建的花粉记录数量，提高相对花粉生产力估计的准确性，以及扩大花粉数据收集站点的地理覆盖范围，以确保不同植被带的多样性代表性。
